title: Case, ca. 1700–1800
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Bottom, wooden case covered with shagreen. Case has two oval shaped openings for a knife and a fork.

tombstone.epitaph:
Case, ca. 1700–1800.
ca. 1700–1800. shark skin, wood. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-119-b.
